chav1961.purelib.i18n

Class LocaleSpecificTextWrapper<T extends JComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • chav1961.purelib.i18n.LocaleSpecificTextWrapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - any JComponent or it's child
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocaleSpecificTextSetter

    public abstract class LocaleSpecificTextWrapper<T extends JComponent>
extends Object
implements LocaleSpecificTextSetter

    This utility class can be used as container for some swing objects to support automatic localization for them. It implements a LocaleSpecificTextSetter interface and contains getComponent() method to get access to wrapped object. Don't use this class directly, but it's static methods as a factory methods

    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
    See Also:
    Localizer, chav1961.purelib.fsys, JUnit tests
